name: Halzae: Heroes of Divinity
description: Halzae: Heroes of Divinity is a dynamic and competitive multiplayer online Arena Brawler, in which 2 to 8 players fight in free-for-all or in team. Each player chooses his Hero, his spells, and jumps into battle. Pick up Halzae's essence in the arenas to fire up your spells, and fulfill the objectives.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel core i5 2320 3.0 Ghz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti /AMD Radeon R7 370 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
